item.title: What is a business that can make Millions for me?
item.description: Have you ever heard or read a question like this before? Iâ€™ve read and heard this hundred times. Instead of getting tired of it, I try to seek for the answer. I read a lot of books and articles of Billionaires out there. You name it! Bill Gates, Richard Branson, Warren Buffett, Ray Dalio, etc. And I do it for myself! Yes, I’m also one of those people who have such questions, just like other people out there who want to have more money for themselves.
